column4: okay stupid question... noatun is a media player for KDE... does that mean i cant run it in Gnome?  or does that mean it just wont run as well in gnome?
It means it uses KDE libraries, if you download it through apt-get, it will pull out the correct packages
I have found that KDE apps generally dont run very well in GNOME - because of KDE's dreaded DCOP server
